bird. He wanted to help the bird. Then, Tim's mom told him that the bird needs to exercise its wings to fly. Tim thought about it and decided to help the bird.

He also felt strong and healthy because of the exercise. Tim learned that exercise is good for everyone, and it is important to try new things even if you are worried.
